pages.text: When casting $(l:mechanics/1_nature_spell)spells$(/l), $(9)elemental affinity$() of $(l:items/2_wand)wand$(/l), $(l:items/1_crystal)crystal$(/l), and player will reduce the $(9)mana consumption$() of the spell.$(br2)The higher the affinity, the less mana is consumed when casting spells of the corresponding element.
